thread.title: Win a top quality ski outfit
thread.title_full: Win a top quality ski outfit - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a top quality ski outfit
text: French winter-sports clothing brand Eider has a heritage that is grounded in quality tailoring, a strong technical edge and a history rooted in the Alps. All of this ensures that each winter Eider produces top-quality, elegant performance ski wear. The men’s Wide Angle collection is Eider’s latest and is designed specifically for those daring to try something new. The range uses an evolved design of outer shell featuring a lighter PrimaLoft insulation and extra-breathable lining. The outfit combination of the relaxed fit Revelstoke Jacket and Jager Pants is aimed at giving confidence to explore the mountain, whether in the backcountry or cruising the pistes. This stylish collection will keep you comfortable no matter what the conditions. There are treats in store for faux fur fans too. Eider’s head turning collection of women’s ski jackets and pants means you’ll be spoilt for choice. Eider has teamed up with Snow+Rock (snowandrock.com) to give away £1,500 worth of kit. Two lucky winners will each receive a men’s or women’s jacket and pants outfit from Eider. For more information visit eider.com and snowandrock.com . Closing date for entries is December 5 2015. Terms and conditions apply. Online Form - Win a top quality ski outfit Telegraphtravel
